buff_description.english: The shipyard construction exhibition in your academy attracts leading figures in the realm of ship construction to your city.

buff_fluff.english: Increases the chance of shipyard related legendary visitors.
buff_fluff.german: Erhöhte Wahrscheinlichkeit für Experten für den Schiffsbau.

item_set_description.english: Expositions centered around the construction and maintainance of ships will attract the most ingenious ship builders the world has seen.

item_set_description.english: The most accomplished logistical genuises work together to optimize your harbors.

item_set_description.english: The top minds of agricultural science work together to perfect the harvesting process.

item_set_description.english: The use of further automation greatly reduces the probability of an accident in your mines.
item_set_description.german: Die Nutzung von automatisierten Prozessen verringert die Anzahl an Minenunfällen stark.

item_set_description.english: Put together, the experts in your city devise new strategies for filament production.
item_set_description.german: Gemeinsam haben Experten in dieser Stadt ein verbessertes Verfahren für die Glühfadenproduktion ersonnen.
